text: Alain De Carvalho (born 9 June 1953) is a former French racing cyclist. He rode in four editions of the Tour de France between 1978 and 1981. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists Category:People from Ussel Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Corrèze
title: Alain De Carvalho
